hooks.command: PROTECTED_PATTERNS=('*/etc/*' '*/usr/bin/*' '*/usr/sbin/*' '*.production.*' '*prod*config*' '*/node_modules/*' '*/vendor/*'); for pattern in "${PROTECTED_PATTERNS[@]}"; do if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == $pattern ]]; then echo "Error: File $CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH is protected from modification" >&2; exit 1; fi; done

echo "→ Running security checks..."; if command -v semgrep >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "  - semgrep (static analysis)"; semgrep --config=auto "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" || true; fi; if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]] && command -v bandit >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "  - bandit (Python security)"; uv run bandit -q "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" || true; fi; if command -v gitleaks >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "  - gitleaks (secrets detection)"; gitleaks detect --source="$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --no-git || true; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then echo "→ Formatting with black..."; uv run black "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" || true; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then echo "→ Type checking with mypy..."; uv run mypy "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" || true; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then echo "→ Linting with ruff..."; uv run ruff check --fix "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" || true; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *pyproject.toml || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *uv.lock ]]; then echo "✓ UV dependency file modified: $CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH"; if command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "\n→ Syncing dependencies..."; uv sync 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi
